00027 #ifndef __DEFAULT_SKIN_H__
00028 #define __DEFAULT_SKIN_H__
00029 
00030 #include "omega/ui/WidgetFactory.h"
00031 
00032 namespace omega
00033 {
00034 namespace ui
00035 {
00036 
00038 class OUTILS_API DefaultButton: public Button
00039 {
00040 public:
00041         DefaultButton(String name): Button(name) {}
00042 
00043 protected:
00044         void renderContent();
00045 
00046 private:
00047         float myAnim;
00048 };
00049 
00051 class OUTILS_API DefaultSlider: public Slider
00052 {
00053 public:
00054         DefaultSlider(String name): Slider(name) {}
00055 protected:
00056         void renderContent();
00057 private:
00058         float myAnim;
00059 };
00060 
00062 class DefaultWidgetFactory: public WidgetFactory
00063 {
00064 public:
00065         virtual Button* createButton(String name, Container* container)
00066         {
00067                 Button* button = new DefaultButton(name);
00068                 container->addChild(button);
00069                 return button;
00070         }
00071 
00072         virtual Slider* createSlider(String name, Container* container)
00073         {
00074                 Slider* slider = new DefaultSlider(name);
00075                 container->addChild(slider);
00076                 return slider;
00077         }
00078 };
00079 
00080 
00081 }; // namespace ui
00082 }; // namespace omega
